header.title: Girl, 4, in wheelchair told she’s a ‘drain on society’ and shouldn’t be alive
header.postText: A four-year-old girl is ‘traumatised’ after a man screamed abuse at her in her wheelchair and told her she ‘shouldn’t have been born’.', 'Quinn Ross, who has a rare childhood condition called Perthes’ disease, was on her way to school with her mum Emma and big brother Alex, 10, when the thug began ‘yelling in her face’.', 'Emma, 32, said the abuse in Cheshunt, Hertfordshire, was ‘appalling’.', 'She said: ‘The man was yelling in her face, saying she shouldn’t have been born, she was a drain on the NHS, a drain on society and that I should have had her aborted if I’d known she was going to be disabled.', '‘I pushed him away, power-walked off to school and it was the school who phoned the police.’', 'Quinn, whose condition affects her hip bone making it agonising to walk, is now in counselling after telling her mum she didn’t want to be seen in her wheelchair.', 'Emma added: ‘Quinn is now scared of men and doesn’t like going out in her wheelchair. It left her feeling very angry at the world, but we’ve had a lot of support.’', 'It is hoped that Quinn will one day not need the wheelchair but she can currently only walk 10 to 15 steps at a time.', 'Police are treating the attack last month as a disability hate crime.', 'PC Terasa Holden said: ‘No-one should worry about leaving home and facing abuse, particularly a little girl who is in too much pain to walk to school because of a rare medical condition.', '‘My colleagues and I have worked to support Quinn and her family and hope other people will come forward and report this kind of crime.', '‘We want people to know that we take all reports of hate crime very seriously and will always investigate.’
header.socioLingVar: Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments,Age - Youngsters, Ideological and Political Identity - General,Age - Over 65s,Behavioural Addiction - Drugs,Social Class - Working class,Nationality - Irish,Religious Identity - Roman Catholic,Nationality - German

commentThread.commentText: Maybe he shouldn't have been born, he was back of the queue when they were dishing out brains.

replies.commentText: no, no, no he though they said trains not brains and said "i'll take a later one"
Craig Olson she hasn't personally posted that rubbish it's from a spambot. There's tons of spam on every comments section on the metro. Best not to try and reason with a bot.

commentThread.commentText: Ten years of constant propaganda against the sick and disabled has brought things like this about. Imagine how much of a walking garbage bag you have to be, to scream abuse at a four year old child?
Hopefully someone will kick him in the nuts when they find him

I like to say I never wish ill on another but a year or so of a wheelchair might improve both his karma and  his attitude.  ANYONE can wind up in a wheelchair at any time, and might have done ALL the right things and still not be able to pay for the damages to themselves or that chair on their own.  Been there, done that.  'Murica.
This fkr  needs to be castrated. That way he'll never breed more morons like him into the world

replies.commentText: Those of us with children with various unique qualities know that these children give unquestioning love to their parents and siblings.  Most of them prove the medical 'experts' wrong and go on to lead a happy and loving life.

commentThread.commentText: Martin Leamonlook
What a horrible peson he i
Would really like to meet him...dark alley..
I've heard similar comments. Far worse to be saying such rubbish to an impressionable little kid though!

replies.commentText: As one who grew up hearing sh*t like this ( blind since birth), I can attest: You battle this kind of crap through adulthood.

commentThread.commentText: Sadly, I'm not surprised. I too, grew up hearing sh*t like this from sighties.Ableds? I don't trust you and this is exactly why.

replies.commentText: Please don't take us all with the same brush - we're not all like this. Her mum may well be able and the police too.

commentThread.commentText: Where did this take place? That's a tactic right out of the pre-holocaust Nazi playbook. Except the Nazis actually murdered disabled people. It was training for what was to come in the death camps.
SHE IS A GORGEOUS LITTLE GIRL <3

"Arbeit Macht Frei." Roughly translated it means "Work sets you free". These words were inscribed over Dachau, Auschwitz, and many other Nazi work and death camps. What they didn't tell you is that they were going to literally work you to death, torment, starve and tortue you the entire time, and your only freedom would be an unmarked grave. Despicably evil and, guess what? The prison guards in the 3rd Reich were volunteers! People who were too cowardly to fight on the front lines so they opted for a cushy job back home where they could get off on torturing helpless victims. Sociopathic bullies and cowards.

replies.commentText: A phrase famously propounded by Iain Duncan Smith in 2015.

commentThread.commentText: Any more details of the accused beyond "man"?
I had some drug addict do that to me in the street when I was a kid.
drain gang

Another example of the vile elements of our society that have been emboldened by the disgusting rhetoric espoused by our elected representatives.I do hope this little girl isn't too traumatised by this disgraceful act. If it had been my child I would have resorted to violence. It's not the way to deal with it, but it's the only actions these morons understand.
Metro don't print a story like this without giving out a description of the disgusting vile lunatic

I bet that man doesn't live a healthy lifestyle and soon, his health will deteriote, requiring NHS intervention. Should we call him out for being a drain to the NHS because of his poor lifestyle choices?
So she says

replies.commentText: Why should she lie? As a lot of people with disabilities will tell you this is a common occurrence, or are we all making it up?
Mick Gorman Just like hundred of hoaxes reported to police. No witnesses to the event. NONE. Police had nothing to go on. Only a vague description.
Kay Cog go back under the bridge that spawned you, troll.  Your tactless cry for attention and validation has somewhat backfired.

commentThread.commentText: How did the 'Boys in Blue' get on tracking the creep down? Or were they too busy manning speed traps or the likes.
The Hostile Environment.
If he said that to my daughter I would have to lift her out so as to use the wheelchair to take him to hospital..

It's a pretty sad reflection of our country that these incidents are not uncommon and many of us with a disability (or in my case a learning disability) have been made to feel like it's our fault and we're in some way defective, I only hope that police catch the guy, it's inexcusable enough to yell at a stranger in the street but to distress a little girl on her way to school is beyond disgraceful

replies.commentText: Ingrid Allan - I only learnt I am autistic last year, but have been bullied all my life and told by supervisor at last job that I wasn't fit for purpose........plus much worse!

commentThread.commentText: The only difference between this thug & the Bullingdon barbarians is presentational acumen.
I have been subject to this kind of abuse, it is bad enough as an adult, it must be horrendous for a small child. I hope the “thug” is caught and suitably punished.
What a vile bigoted creature he was, EVERYONE deserves to live regardless.......except him maybe.

Having been diagnosed with Pethes disease when I was 5, im now a grumpy 51yo with 2 kids of my own, 1 in a wheelchair through a genetic condition called PFFD.  Karma for the individual concerned could give him a child with unique abilities and I qonder how he would feel if somebody said that his child should of been aborted........

replies.commentText: He'd probably just walk outon the family and start again somewhere else

commentThread.commentText: This has made me so sad. What a beautiful little girl and what sort of a sick, twisted individual would say something like this

Unfortunately, this is nothing new. The point of view was usually spouted by daft old people, but seems to have perpetuated. I hope the girl manages to put the actions of this cretin behind her and she is able to walk. In any event, I wish her all the very best for the future.

I believe the police actually spoke to the offender and the mother of the little girl decided not to press charges (if you believe the press). So the cretin was identified and got away with it  - lets hope his identity gets leaked on the internet - let him see how it feels to be the victim of hate (although he truely deserves it, the little girl didnt )
Disgusting , but did she need to say she `power walked to school`. Is that relevant ?

replies.commentText: Yes, because that's the important part of the article.

commentThread.commentText: Who the hell does that to a child? bless her heart. I've paid my taxes and I would rather pay to help your daughter than someone like him. It's him who should be in therapy! I hope your daughter doesn't let this go on an effect her growing up, and I hope she sees that she can succeed and become something regardless of what idiots like this say to her or about her, times are changing, and your daughter will be part of the new inclusive world while this guy will be left on the sidelines till he changes his views and attitudes! People like him will be left far behind whilst your daughter soars :)
Tabloid obsession with 'benefit scroungers' is to blame for the rise in hate crimes against the sick and disabled.
I feel so so Sad to hear this story. Why would anyone be so cruel, No one should ever shout or appraoch any Child under any circumstances, This Man is pure evil......mik
Probably a nutter, care in the community was a total failure and nothing is done until they hurt people, there's plenty of nutters walking around whom are permanently angry and itching for a fight
what a totally stupid and ignorant man, Perthes is quite treatable and in no way affects the child's mental capabilities. I hope this ignoramus was firmly put in his place
Hitler, Dr Mengel and co. would have been proud of him
Co w
Lots of love to Quinn.  Sad she had to experience that, but to know that his actions are about him, not her.  She is amazing inspiration to be getting on at school and otherwise, with her condition.

We need a government that is truly focussed on improving ordrinary people's lives and not just paying lip service.  Even Boris Johnsons advisor stated that the conservatives are predominantly just interested in themselves and the priviliged sector.
Another step closer to Nazi Germany...
What a f*****g monster. How could you speak to a child like that.

replies.commentText: I'd like to put him in a chair for life

commentThread.commentText: This is why I don't go outside anymore and my I moved house (adapted for my ability) after constant abuse from a neighbour. Thanks to the rhetoric that disabled people are scroungers.
There I was naively thinking this was online abuse🙄. What a POS 🤮

The poor child, this behaviour is pathetic. Such a big tough man that he can pick on disabled 4 year olds? Yet another cretin emboldened by the continued degredation of this nation's society into open oppression and bigotry.

Sounds like this could be solved by a philanthropist with a sledgehammer. Maybe he could find the guy and do him the favour of putting him in a wheelchair permanently, so that he can learn some empathy.
Is there a page or a post by the police where we can leave uplifting comments for little Quinn and her mum?

i can not send email would one of you please tell her she is loved by alot of us and hold her head up high there is nothing wrong with being different

I hope someone Finds this Piece of GARBAGE and CUTS HIS LEGS off, Then he will know how that Poor child feels but will get NO Pity of me the Scum bag,.
